title: Apple Watch Series 8 could focus on fitness tracking instead of additional health sensors
content:
The Apple Watch is one of the greatest devices for fitness tracking and other non-health related features. When you buy an Apple Watch, you know that you’re investing in a device that could literally save your life one day. Last year, the company unveiled new models with larger screens and the biggest upgrade to battery

The post Apple Watch Series 8 could focus on fitness tracking instead of additional health sensors appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The upcoming Apple Watch Series 8 could reportedly focus on improved fitness tracking, rather than adding new health sensors.
